To use the RSH queue system you must first set a list of computers which ERT can use for running jobs. The first column takes the computer names, the second takes the number of jobs for each computer.
When using the RSH option, note the following:
  1. You must have passwordless login to the computers listed in the Host List.
  2. ERT will not consider the total load on the various computers; if having said a computer can take two jobs, it will get two jobs, irrespective of the existing load.
